entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Periods of light snow or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
